General.Name: THINKWARE Corporation
General.Description: THINKWARE Corporation provides location-based services worldwide. It offers hardware products, such as GPS navigation systems, das cam, and car window films, as well as tablet PCs for education sectors; and software for digital maps, mobiles, and advanced driver assistance systems and augmented reality. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
General.Address: 240, Building A, Samhwan Hipex, Seongnam-si, South Korea
